item.imbued_gear.ensouled_gem.recipe: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and breed a lot of animals.
item.imbued_gear.void_gem.recipe: Toss a Gem of Promise into the void.
item.imbued_gear.celestial_trident.flavo: It blazes with the power of the Cosmos.
item.imbued_gear.champions_trident.flavo: An elegant weapon for a champion of the people.
item.imbued_gear.nihil_blade.flavor: The inky depths shimmering within call out to you
item.imbued_gear.radiant_broadsword.flav: It's surface gleams softly even in the darkest of nights.
item.imbued_gear.warriors_axe.flavor: Monsters shudder at the thought of the hefty blade rending them asunder.
item.imbued_gear.crackling_spellblade.fl: Tales say it's bearer can move faster than the eye can see.
item.imbued_gear.blaze_of_light.flavor: A blaze of light in every word...
item.imbued_gear.book_of_secrets.flavor: Sought after by many mages for the arcane knowledge inscribed within.
item.imbued_gear.bone_rattle.flavor: Grants the power to command indomitable armies.
item.imbued_gear.bone_rattle.flavor.desc: Shift-scroll to select power, right click on summon to use.
Grants bonus damage to the target, and less bonus damage to nearby summons.
item.imbued_gear.bone_rattle.bone_healin: Heals the target by 50%, and heal nearby summons by 20%.
Adds bone armor to the target, and less bone armor to nearby summons. Stacks with other bone armor.
Grants speed to the target, and less speed to nearby summons.
item.imbued_gear.caduceus.flavor: Often thought to be a symbol of healing, this symbol of commerce nonetheless protects the bearer from harm.
item.imbued_gear.crown_of_sorrows.flavor: So much death, so much sorrow and regret...
item.imbued_gear.divine_coronet.flavor: Crowned with the fabric of the sun and moon.
item.imbued_gear.living_flame.flavor: A spark of life itself, sealed away in glass to blaze forth on command.
item.imbued_gear.pendant_of_memories.fla: This strange locket is fueled by the memories of your past atrocities.
item.imbued_gear.pendant_of_memories.inn: Whenever you gain experience, heal a small amount.
Kills repair this pendant. When fully repaired it uses up it's durability to repair mana items in your inventory.
item.imbued_gear.ring_of_souls.flavor: Do you hear them crying out?
item.imbued_gear.energetic_band.flavor: You crackle with energy while wearing it.
item.imbued_gear.strange_timepiece.flavo: Time seems to move strangely when you hold it.
enchantment.imbued_gear.bankai.desc: Slash enemies in front of you so quickly you appear to teleport past them.
scepter.modifier.imbued_gear:healers_rew: Gain 1 experience for every healing spell cast.
scepter.modifier.imbued_gear:cosmic.desc: Spell level increased by 1, cooldown and mana cost decreased by 25%, damage increased by 2, spell effect duration increased by 25%.
scepter.modifier.imbued_gear:whisper_of_: Damage increased by 25%, Spell level increased by 1, and spell amplification increased by 2 levels.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:wisened.d: Adds 1.5 experience whenever a player gains xp
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:very_expe: Adds 0.75 experience whenever a player gains xp
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:experienc: Adds 0.25 experience whenever a player gains xp
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:inexperie: Removes 0.25 experience from the amount a player would gain
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:inept.des: Removes 1.0 experience from the amount a player would gain
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:scholarly: Adds 1 experience whenever a player gains xp
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:protectio: Reduces damage taken from undead by 20%
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:nothingne: Attacks have a chance to reduce the targets maximum health temporarily
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:null_spac: +10% magic resistance, and hitting mobs has a chance of applying stacks of Cursed to the target.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:radiant_b: Killing enemies has a chance to add Absorption hearts.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:radiant_d: Killing enemies stacks levels of Blessed on the wearer.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:radiant_a: Killing enemies heals based on stacks of Blessing the user has.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:flesh_ren: Chance to deal a +50% damage critical strike. Charge the axe to guarantee a powerful strike.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:kindled.d: +20% attack speed, +7.5% movement speed, adds the Stoked modifier to scepter wielded by the wearer.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:divine.de: Once per 5 minutes, resist death; instead gain Absorption, Strength, and Attack Speed.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:fiery.des: Attacks set enemies on fire. Take 20% less damage from on-fire mobs.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:master_of: 50% damage taken from elemental damage. On-fire or freezing enemies take more damage.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:horde_mas: Nearby summons and pets are granted Bone Armor
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:lust_for_: Kills grant stacks of Spell Rage and Blade Rage
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:voids_ech: Has a chance to deal massive damage to Cursed or Nihilistic opponents.
equipment.modifier.imbued_gear:true_smit: Massively increases damage to wounded undead.
ia.readme.main_header.title: README - Imbued Gear
